name: NS Virtual Services
tagline: Getting You Ahead Without the Overhead!™
description: NS Virtual Services provides virtual business services to entrepreneurs and businesses ranging from general admin and customer service, to social media and web development. Being a multi-VA team, we match you with the best VA, and if we don’t have what you are looking for, then we will find that special person for you! The advantage of hiring a team is that you will always have a trained backup to guarantee your continuity of service.
